div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 07:53 am CDT

div.div: A chance of showers and thunderstorms, then showers and possibly a thunderstorm after 9am. High near 65. East wind 5 to 10 mph becoming northwest in the morning. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

Showers and thunderstorms likely before 1am, then a slight chance of showers between 1am and 4am. Cloudy, then gradually becoming partly cloudy, with a low around 47. North wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.
Sunny, with a high near 67. North wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

div.center: Welcome to the Jefferson West USD 340 website. We appreciate your interest in our schools and hope you find the information included on this website to be helpful. If you have questions regarding our district, please call or drop us an e-mail.

div.p: USD 340 is providing meals through a Grab and Go process.
Free meals are available for any child ages 1-18.
Mondays (two lunch and two breakfast meals) and
Wednesdays (three lunch and three breakfast meals) for any child ages 1 to 18.
Our main drive up site is the front the Jefferson West Elementary School at 301 Main Street, Meriden from 11 AM to 12:30 PM
We will also have distribution sites in:
Rock Creek intersection of 110th Street and Olive Street from 11:00 to 11:30 AM,
Ozawkie at the City Park on Kansa from 11:45 AM to 12:15 PM,
Anderson's Trailer Park - At the intersection of Detlor Road and Park Drive go east 1/4 mile to A Street by Anderson's Trailer court, from 11:00 AM to 11:30 AM
Lake Ridge Estates in the upper parking lot of the Lake Perry Country Club from 11:45 AM to 12:15 PM.
If you have any questions contact Debby Bouton at 484-3331 or Pat Happer at 484-3444.

a.aria-label: Read more about USD 340 Grab and Go
